verses.verse: Bel <S%H1078><s%> boweth <S%H3766>down,<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> <S%H7164>stoopeth,<s%> their <S%H6091>idols<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> upon the <S%H2416>beasts,<s%> and upon the <S%H929>cattle:<s%> your <S%H5385>carriages<s%> were heavy <S%H6006>laden;<s%> they are a <S%H4853>burden<s%> to the <S%H5889>weary<s%> beast.

They <S%H7164>stoop,<s%> they bow <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> the <S%H4853>burden,<s%> but <S%H5315>themselves<s%> are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which are <S%H6006>borne<s%> by me <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H990>belly,<s%> which are <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the womb: <S%H7356><s%>

And even <S%H5704>to<s%> your old <S%H2209>age<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H1931>he;<s%> and even <S%H5704>to<s%> hoar <S%H7872>hairs<s%> will <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H5445>carry<s%> you: <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5375>bear;<s%> even <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5445>carry,<s%> and will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> you.
To <S%H4310>whom<s%> will ye <S%H1819>liken<s%> me, and make me <S%H7737>equal,<s%> and <S%H4911>compare<s%> me, that we may be <S%H1819>like?<s%>

They <S%H2107>lavish<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> out of the <S%H4480>bag,<s%> <S%H3599><s%> and <S%H8254>weigh<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H7070>balance,<s%> and <S%H7936>hire<s%> a <S%H6884>goldsmith;<s%> and he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it a <S%H410>god:<s%> they fall <S%H5456>down,<s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> they <S%H7812>worship.<s%>

They <S%H5375>bear<s%> him <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3802>shoulder,<s%> they <S%H5445>carry<s%> him, and <S%H5117>set<s%> him in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> and he <S%H5975>standeth;<s%> from his <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H4725><s%> shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4185>remove:<s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> one shall <S%H6817>cry<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, yet can he <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>answer,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> him out of his <S%H4480>trouble.<s%> <S%H6869><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> and show yourselves <S%H377>men:<s%> bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3820>mind,<s%> O ye <S%H6586>transgressors.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> of <S%H4480>old:<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H410>God,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else;<s%> I am <S%H430>God,<s%> and there is <S%H657>none<s%> like <S%H3644>me,<s%>

Declaring <S%H5046><s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> from the <S%H4480>beginning,<s%> <S%H7225><s%> and from ancient <S%H4480>times<s%> <S%H6924><s%> the things <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> yet <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> My <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my pleasure: <S%H2656><s%>

Calling <S%H7121><s%> a ravenous <S%H5861>bird<s%> from the <S%H4480>east,<s%> <S%H4217><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> that executeth my <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H4480>country:<s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H637>yea,<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, I will <S%H637>also<s%> bring it to <S%H935>pass;<s%> I have <S%H3335>purposed<s%> it, I will <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it.
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, ye <S%H47>stouthearted,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> that are <S%H7350>far<s%> from <S%H4480>righteousness:<s%> <S%H6666><s%>

I bring <S%H7126>near<s%> my <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be far <S%H7368>off,<s%> and my <S%H8668>salvation<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H309>tarry:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H8597>glory.<s%>
